mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT sar.audit_user, count(*) AS audit_count, #{startDate} as start_date,#{endDate} as end_date FROM sm_change_detail scd LEFT JOIN sm_material_change_audit_record sar ON scd.change_no = sar.change_no LEFT JOIN customer_contract cc ON cc.contract_code = scd.contract_code WHERE sar.audit_result = 'EXAMINATIONPASSED' AND sar.audit_user_type = '审计员' AND Date(sar.audit_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND cc.store_code = #{storeCode} GROUP BY sar.audit_user ) AS temp

SELECT * FROM( SELECT sar.audit_user,count(*) as audit_count,#{startDate} as start_date,#{endDate} as end_date FROM sm_change_detail scd LEFT JOIN sm_material_change_audit_record sar ON scd.change_no = sar.change_no LEFT JOIN customer_contract cc ON cc.contract_code = scd.contract_code WHERE sar.audit_result = 'EXAMINATIONPASSED' AND sar.audit_user_type = '审计员' AND Date(sar.audit_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND cc.store_code = #{storeCode} GROUP BY sar.audit_user ) temp ORDER BY audit_count DESC

SELECT sar.audit_user,cc.contract_code,scd.change_no,sar.audit_time FROM sm_change_detail scd LEFT JOIN sm_material_change_audit_record sar ON scd.change_no = sar.change_no LEFT JOIN customer_contract cc ON cc.contract_code = scd.contract_code WHERE sar.audit_result = 'EXAMINATIONPASSED' AND sar.audit_user_type = '审计员' AND sar.audit_user = #{auditUser} AND Date(sar.audit_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND cc.store_code = #{storeCode} ORDER BY sar.audit_time DESC
